      • findTriplesInInitialStateThatChange

        public java.util.List<KbTriple> findTriplesInInitialStateThatChange()
        Returns:
        a list that includes a triple (a,r,b) if the triple is in triplesRemoved and also there exists a triple (a,r,x) in triplesAdded, for some x.
